image.altText: Three Knights players celebrate a try in the NRLW grand final.

liveBlogPostPrepared.title: The Knights are back-to-back NRLW champions!

liveBlogPostPrepared.plaintext: The Knights looked off a field goal opportunity, spun it wide to Upton and said 'do something' and boy did she. At pace, she played the most deft grubber into the in-goal, chasing through and touching down just inside the dead-ball line. Southwell converts and the Knights lead 24-18 with 2:15 to go.
liveBlogPostPrepared.title: UPTON BREAKS IT OPEN!!

children.content: The Knights looked off a field goal opportunity, spun it wide to Upton and said 'do something' and boy did she. At pace, she played the most deft grubber into the in-goal, chasing through and touching down just inside the dead-ball line.
Southwell converts and the Knights lead 24-18 with 2:15 to go.

liveBlogPostPrepared.plaintext: Jesse Southwell converts and it's 18-18. Genuine grandstand finish set up now, with plenty of time for a few more tries.
liveBlogPostPrepared.title: Scores are level heading into the last seven minutes!

children.content: Genuine grandstand finish set up now, with plenty of time for a few more tries.
